Package org.apache.wayang.core.optimizer.costs

Interface EstimationContext

All Known Implementing Classes:
DynamicEstimationContext, OptimizationContext.OperatorContext, SimpleEstimationContext
public interface EstimationContext
Provides parameters required by LoadProfileEstimators.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final JsonSerializer<EstimationContext>
    defaultSerializer
    Default JsonSerializer for EstimationContexts.

    Provide a normalized instance, that has only a single execution.

  • Field Details

    • defaultSerializer

      static final JsonSerializer<EstimationContext> defaultSerializer
      Default JsonSerializer for EstimationContexts. Does not support deserialization, though.

  • Method Details

    • getInputCardinalities

      CardinalityEstimate[] getInputCardinalities()
      Provide the input CardinalityEstimates for the Operator that corresponds to this instance.
      Returns:
      the CardinalityEstimates, which can contain nulls

    • getOutputCardinalities

      CardinalityEstimate[] getOutputCardinalities()
      Provide the output CardinalityEstimates for the Operator that corresponds to this instance.
      Returns:
      the CardinalityEstimates, which can contain nulls

    • getDoubleProperty

      double getDoubleProperty(String propertyKey, double fallback)
      Retrieve a double-valued property in this context.
      Parameters:
      propertyKey - the key for the property
      fallback - the value to use if the property could not be delivered
      Returns:
      the property value or fallback

    • getPropertyKeys

      Collection<String> getPropertyKeys()
      Retrieve the eligible property keys for getDoubleProperty(String, double).
      Returns:
      the property keys

    • getNumExecutions

      int getNumExecutions()
      Retrieve the number of executions to be estimated.
      Returns:
      the number of executions.

    • getNormalizedEstimationContext

      default EstimationContext getNormalizedEstimationContext()
      Provide a normalized instance, that has only a single execution. The CardinalityEstimates will be adapted accordingly.
      Returns:
      the normalized instance
      See Also:
      • normalize(CardinalityEstimate[], int)

    • normalize

      static CardinalityEstimate[] normalize(CardinalityEstimate[] estimates, int numExecutions)
      Normalize the given estimates by dividing them by a number of executions.
      Parameters:
      estimates - that should be normalized
      numExecutions - the number execution
      Returns:
      the normalized estimates (and estimates if numExecution == 1
